title: 70% users say will stop using UPI if fees levied
description: According to a survey by Local Circles, 7 out of 10 UPI users would stop using the app if transaction fees were imposed. Fintech companies have urged finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman to address the issue of implementing a merchant discount rate (MDR) in UPI transactions.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
